title: How do I unlock my P8 directly using the TalkBand B2?
answer:
1. Pair your phone with the TalkBand B2. 

 2. On your phone, touch Settings > Screen lock & passwords >Â Smart unlock, and set the screen unlock pattern and passcode. 

 3. Return to the Settings screen, touch Security > Trusted agents, and enable Smart unlock. 

 4. Touch Add a Bluetooth device and select the TalkBand B2 for smart unlock. 

 5. Press the power button to lock the screen, and turn on the screen to check whether an unlock pattern is required. 

 When your TalkBand B2 is within range, turn on the phone screen and slide to unlock your phone without a passcode.
